'''Dew Bubbles''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

* The ability of the [[Xenochromatic Ball Octopus]] can be used to push the Dew Bubbles around. 
* Popping them with an attack causes ripples that react with [[Harmonious Reed Pipe]]s or pop other Dew Bubbles.
* If a Dew Bubble is pushed into another Dew Bubble, they will combine to form a larger bubble with a greater ripple radius.
